name: Protect the Base Soldier
description:
Protect the Base Soldier is set in a French village set in World War II, just before the Normandy landings. 

The Americans are about to unleash one of the toughest invasions of World War II.  PVT. Miller is one of the many thousands of paratroopers set to para-drop behind enemy lines. The para-drop went very badly and PVT. Miller had gotten split up after the jump. He soon found American paratroopers that took over a strategic village that has vital information for the Americans. But they have to wait until reinforcements arrive, but the German forces have regrouped and are about to launch a counter attack on the village! 

The goal of the game is to survive oncoming enemies for one minute, you are also tasked in protecting the main building on the street. If the timer hits zero you will win the game. Or if the objective reaches zero hp, you will lose the game.
